comments: Compositions of n into parts 3, 4, and 5. - _David Neil McGrath_, Jul 28 2014.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,1,1,1).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[1 / (1 - x^3 - x^4 - x^5), {x, 0, 50}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 27 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) m:=50; R<x>:=PowerSeriesRing(Integers(), m); Coefficients(R!(1/(1-x^3-x^4-x^5))); /* or */ I:=[1,0,0,1,1]; [n le 5 select I[n] else Self(n-3)+Self(n-4)+Self(n-5): n in [1..50]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 27 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
